synopsis.text: Korean/Japanese collaborative production, Turning Mecard introduces us to Jason, a young grade-schooler who embarks on a thrilling adventure when he encounters a transforming minicar, Evan, hailing from the alternate dimension of Triforce. As both Jason and Evan share a common goal of locating their missing family members, they join forces to aid one another. Throughout their journey, they meet a diverse array of Mecanimals and engage in battles across dimensions, all while learning valuable life lessons along the way.
